MaterialIcon.description: renders a material design icon with given color, size, and type

Attributes.description: color of icon, defaults to inherited color

Attributes.name: size
Attributes.description: size of icon

Attributes.name: type
Attributes.description: The key of the icon to use

Methods.description: As many of the material icons are the same but go by different names, this function maps them to one name to save on space

Events.description: called when the button comes into focus

Events.description: called when the button mousedown is triggered

Events.description: called when the button is hovered

Events.name: whenmouseleave
Events.description: called when the button loses hover

Events.name: whenmouseup
Events.description: called when the button mouseup is triggered

Attributes.description: an array of objects {values/value, label, disabled} to populate checkboxes with

Attributes.name: assistiveText

Attributes.description: whether or not to show character count text

Attributes.description: classes to apply, currently supports small, transparent, center

Attributes.description: adds a clear button to the left of the input, used to clear the value

Attributes.description: if there is an error in the value

Attributes.name: filterOptions
Attributes.description: whether or not to filter the options list based on value

Attributes.name: icon

Attributes.name: label
Attributes.description: label of the input

Attributes.name: max
Attributes.description: maximum of characters for text type or maximum value for number type

Attributes.name: min
Attributes.description: minimum of characters for text type or minimum value for number type

Attributes.name: multiline
Attributes.description: whether or not the input should wrap and increase in height like a textarea element

Attributes.name: options
Attributes.description: an array of options to show, such as suggestions

Attributes.name: required
Attributes.description: whether the input is required, set as a todo item

Attributes.name: selfUpdate
Attributes.description: Whether or not component can update value. default is false as this should be handled by controller

Attributes.name: step
Attributes.description: for number type, amount to increment value

Attributes.name: type
Attributes.description: type of input, either text or number
